Synopsis: The Perfect wave is a LOVE STORY, with four key pillars, a young mans love for surfing, adventure, a mothers love for her son, a young man falling in love for the first time, Gods love. The journey has many unexpected turns, and twists, as our hero falls in-love and looses his way, but as fate would have it, jealousy causes a breakup, and seeking to reconcile our hero travels to Mauritius where he gets stung by a box jelly fish, which changes his life forever.
